tool_description: Evaluates the druggability potential of protein targets by analyzing structural features, binding sites, and known drug interactions to predict therapeutic viability.

protein_targets.description: List of protein names or UniProt IDs to assess for druggability

structure_database.description: Protein structure database: PDB, AlphaFold, or ChEMBL

drug_databases.description: Drug databases for known interaction analysis

binding_site_threshold.description: Minimum druggability score for binding sites (0-1)

include_allosteric.description: Include allosteric sites in druggability assessment

molecular_weight_range.description: Preferred molecular weight range for drug-like compounds

error_messages: Invalid protein identifier: Some proteins in the list could not be found in the specified database.
Structure database error: Use supported databases - PDB, AlphaFold, or ChEMBL.
Drug database not found: Use valid drug databases like DrugBank, ChEMBL, or PubChem.
Invalid binding site threshold: Must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Invalid molecular weight range: Range must be [50-1000] with min < max.
No structural data available: None of the provided proteins have available structural information.
usage: Provide protein_targets list with valid protein identifiers. Select appropriate databases and configure druggability parameters. Tool returns comprehensive druggability assessment for each target.

druggability_scores.description: Druggability scores for each protein target (0-1)

binding_sites_count.description: Number of druggable binding sites identified per protein

known_drugs.description: Names of known drugs targeting each protein

assessment_summary.description: Overall assessment of target druggability and recommendations
